prefix: Approach the following question the way someone in high school would.
problem_prompt: Approach the following question the way someone in high school would. If the 25th day of the year 2003 falls on a Saturday, on what day of the week did the 284th day of the year 2003 fall?
solution: There are 7 days in a week.  Two days of the year fall on the same day of the week if and only if they are congruent modulo 7.  Notice that  \[284\equiv4\pmod7\] and  \[25\equiv4\pmod7.\] Therefore the 284th day and the 25th day fall on the same day of the week.  Therefore the 284th day of the year falls on a $\boxed{\text{Saturday}}$.
gpt_response:
To figure this out, we need to calculate how many days are between the 25th day of the year and the 284th day. 

There are 284 - 25 = 259 days between these two dates. 

Since there are 7 days in a week, we need to find the remainder when we divide 259 by 7. 

259 ÷ 7 = 37 with a remainder of 0, so the 284th day of the year falls on the same day of the week as the 25th day, which is Saturday.
solution_prompt:
Yes or no, is the final solution obtained in the following equal to \text{Saturday?: To figure this out, we need to calculate how many days are between the 25th day of the year and the 284th day. 

There are 284 - 25 = 259 days between these two dates. 

Since there are 7 days in a week, we need to find the remainder when we divide 259 by 7. 

259 ÷ 7 = 37 with a remainder of 0, so the 284th day of the year falls on the same day of the week as the 25th day, which is Saturday.
